name: David Stuart Robertson 0001
content: Dave Robertson David Robertson - Personal Information Professor of Applied Logic School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh Dean (special projects) College of Science and Engineering, University of Edinburgh Selected research projects: SociaM: The Theory and Practice of Social Machines Smart Society - Hybrid and Diversity-Aware Collective Adaptive Systems Social Collective Intelligence Loch Computer Open Knowledge Safe and Sound Sustainable Lifecycles in Information Ecosystems The Advanced Knowledge Technologies Interdisciplinary Research Collaboration The Dependability Interdisciplinary Research Collaboration Current innovation activities: Farr Institute of Health Informatics Research Digital Healthcare Innovation Centre Data Lab Innovation Centre EIT ICT Labs, London node 1-minute video summary CV Publications (Edinburgh repository), (researchgate) PhD theses of my students Linkedin Prof. David Robertson Edinburgh Bioquarter 9 Little France Road Edinburgh EH16 4UX, UK E-mail: dr@inf.ed.ac.uk Tel: +44 (131) 651 7848
